name: Kitten Bubble
description:
Kitty Bubble is a spiritual sequel to Bubble Bobble and Rainbow Islands done for the ZX Sequel Jam.

Controls:

  • Move: Stick or DPAD or ASDW or Arrows
  • Jump: Xbox button A (or any controller like Playstation or Logitech) or SPACE
  • Shoot: Xbox button X or Left-CTRL
